title: Leave It to Nico!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Nico-sa...... Wow! Your hairstyle is so cute~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>It looks good on me, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>It does~! Did you do it yourself?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Yup.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>You’re so talented~ It looks terrific. It’s sooo cute~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Do you want me to do your hair for you, too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Huh, really!? You’ll make my hair as cute as yours!? Yay~! It’s gonna look amazing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Now you’re just overexaggerating. This will be a piece of cake for me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Awesome...... I respect your talent...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You! You have potential! Here, drink this juice. I’ll get it done while you’re drinking!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
